inn1.comm: good bounce and carry straightaway, well left in the end and Karthik applauds
gets bat on ball and he pushes a full and loose delivery to cover
holds the length back and gives him some width outside off, he reaches out and cuts to third man
he tries to force it away down the ground but ends up pushing it straight to mid-on, good delivery on the stumps
firmly defended down to mid-off and he tells his partner to stay back
hits a good length outside off and really gets it to kick up, good delivery which just beats the edge

Nehra was convinced he nicked it but the umpire Erasmus didn't think so, the bowler gets it to move away late and beat the edge, he started celebrating before looking back in horror, good delivery though
follows that up with a good yorker, well dug out by the batsman there
full again and pushed down to to mid-off
holds the length back and he defends this to the off side
shapes to defend it but he turns the face of the bat and mistimes it to point
that's a maiden over, hits a good length outside off and Tharanga firmly places it to backward point
drifts on the body and he clips it down to fine leg
reaches out to drive but he checks the shot a bit and angles it down to third man
banged in a bit short and some width for the batsman to push it past the covers, Kohli does well to slide and cut it offf
another mistimed drive and this one finds Gambhir at backward point
focuses on restricting width for the batsman, lands on middle stump and he punches it to the off side
angles it more towards leg and he clips it down to midwicket
opportunity missed there for Dilshan as he fails to clip it away off his pads, the ball came onto him fairly quickly and clipped his pads
nearly plays on! Too close to cut and he gets an inside edge and the ball nearly rolls to the off stump
direct hit would have sent him back! Punched hard to mid-off and challenges Jadeja at mid-off, he just misses the stumps
pushes it hard down the pitch and Nehra gets a hand to it and palms it to the off side, there's a direct hit from mid-off but the batsman's safe
fast bouncer, just down the leg side and well collected by Karthik
opens the face of the bat and steers it to point
beats him! Dilshan doesn't ride the bounce and the late away movement, the ball nearly shaves the edge
full and a touch wide and he bashes it but places it straight to extra cover
angles it on the pads and he clips it on its way to fine leg, the fielder does well to keep it to a single
spoons it in the air and the ball drops well in front of cover, they're trying to break free but can't seem to time it properly
good delivery, gets it to nip back in sharply and Tharanga inside edges it onto his pads, not too far from the stumps
tries to pierce the gap at backward point, Kohli dives and Raina backs him up, good stuff there
breaks the shackles, gives him just a hint of width and Dilshan rocks back, meets the ball hard and punches it past the covers, good shot
lands outside leg and hurries onto his pads, the ball rolls to the off side
cuts back on the pace a bit and Tharanga has a wild slash but fails to make contact
he finally puts it away, rising delivery off a good length and he nearly flat-bats it, clears mid-on comfortably
Dropped, default mode folks, Tharanga hits one back hard and spoons it towards Nehra, he cups his hands above his head and spills it, should have been taken
good length on middle and leg and he enjoys a free swing, clubs it just wide of mid-on
at the stumps and defended
direct hit but he's home, Dilshan pinches a quick single to mid-off and Jadeja jas only one stump to aim at and he hits the target
tries to slash that away but the ball keeps a bit lower than expected and nearly takes the inside edge
angles it on middle and leg and he clips him just wide of mid-on for a single
Rains sets an excellent example there, he intercepts a full blooded cover drive off the backfoot, dives and saves a boundary
angles it on middle and leg and he forces it to the on side
hits it over backward square leg

Now Virat Kohli sets a fine example! What a wicket to get, Nehra bangs it in short and Dilshan can't resist the pull, he hits it flat and Kohli sprints to his right from backward square leg, covers a lot of ground and takes the diving catch at long leg, he times his dive perfectly
beats him! Well Zaheer gets it to move away late and tease the left-hander, nearly shaves the edge
nice placement, opens the face of the bat to a full delivery and places it just wide of mid-off, the outfield is quick and the fielder gives it up
gets his elbows high and punches it towards cover and Sehwag does well to dive and cut it off
full on the off stump and driven down to mid-on
kicks up a bit more and gets it to nip back in, he gets an inside edge down to midwicket
off the mark with a boundary! Nehra bowls it full and gets it to swing towards middle and leg and he shuffles across his crease, exposes his leg stumps and gets a faint trickle to fine leg
crisp timing! Outside off and full, he leans forward and a gentle push is enough to beat mid-off, the fielder knew he had no chance the minute it went past him
good length and pushed down to mid-off
softly clipped towards midwicket and he sets off immediately
full on the stumps and pushed down the ground, Ishant is there at long-on to mop up
keeps it a bit short and gets it to rise towards the body, he hops and fends it off
leans forward to drive but he turns the face of the bat and mistimes it to the off side
opens the face of the bat and softly taps it past point, he runs the first one hard and puts pressure on the fielder
that late away movement teases Jayasuriya this time, kicks up and he does well to withdraw his bat
keeps it on the stumps and he mistimes the punch to mid-off
keeps it on the pads and he pushes it to mid-on, Jayasuriya tries to pinch a single
poor start, wide and slightly short outside off, he reaches out and cuts wide of backward point
comes round the wicket, Tharanga opens the face of the bat and punches it down to extra cover
poor delivery there, full and wide and Tharanga gets under the bounce and scoops it over point, third man was too wide to cut it off
terrific shot! Half volley outside off and Tharanga waits for it and punches it off the meat of the bat wide of mid-off, zero effort, only timing, classic stuff
even better! Ishant comes over the wicket but still gives him width, Tharanga almost slices it to find the gap between mid-off and cover, the ball speeds away
20 off the over! Ishant holds the length back outside off and Tharanga reaches out and gets a thick outside edge to third man, no slips and four
pitched up outsie of and Jayasuriya decides to join the fun, scoops it over mid-off, seemed like a mis-hit at first
full outside off and pushed down to cover
well bowled, on the stumps and he gets well forward and defends
tries to clip it through the on side but he finds mid-on

just what India needed at this stage, Zaheer pitches it up outside off and induces Jayasuriya to lunge forward, the ball takes the outside edge and Tendulkar falls forward and takes it comfortably at first slip, no doubts about that
Sangakkara tries to announce his arrival with a bang, slashes hard outside off, tries to find the point boundary but the ball beats the edge
width outside off and he reaches out and cuts to third man
good length on the pads and he tucks it softly down to midwicket
well left, straightens after pitching outside off, good carry
gets his bat behind the line and pushes it to mid-on

Dropped That's a screamer, Harbhajan the culprit, Sangakkara tries to hook a rising delivery but he gets a top edge which goes the other way, all the way down to third man, Harbhajan over-runs the ball and spills it completely
adds further insult to the bowler! He gives him width and Tharanga leans forward and bashes it past the covers, that's his fifty as well! Good comeback by Tharanga after a shaky start
the leading edge this time! Sanga was lucky this time, leans forward to drive and the ball beats slip and runs away
Sangakkara shows the full face of the bat and defends it solidly this time
gets forward and squeezes it down to extra cover
shortish outside off and he angles it just wide of third man for a couple
shortish in length but too wide outside off, very little effort needed by Tharanga to slice it wide of backward point, top shot
slides down the leg side and wide called
this time he's guilty outside the off stump, blow hot blow cold performance by India in the field so far
stays back and defends
lands it outside off and he safely shoulders arms
much wider outside off and he's happy to let it go
stays back and defends it very softly towards the off side
good line and length, cramps him up for room on the off stump and he defends with soft hands
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls and finds deep square leg
a wide down the leg side spoils the over a bit, he doesn't offer a shot
cramps him for room and he softly taps it to the off side
tossed up outside off and defended
tossed up and pushed to the off side for a single
stays back, waits for it and cuts to sweeper cover
tossed up outside off and cut past point
gets on the backfoot, waits for it and cuts it down to third man for a couple
inside edge clips his pads and rolls to the on side
short outside off and punched down to cover
tucks him up for room but he improvises by hopping and angling it down to third man
gets forward and punches it just wide of short cover, the substitute Manoj Tiwary gives the chase
shapes to drive straight but gets an inside edge to the on side
drifts on the pads and he clips him in the air over square leg
lands outside off and he safely shoulders arms to the keeper
slow through the air and defended softly
gets forward and he splices it to point
gets forward and pushes it towards the bowler
tossed up slowly and he defends it down to cover
gets forward and drives it down to sweeper cover
full and wide outside off and he times the drive well and finds Jadeja at deep backward point
tucks him up for room but he manages to pinch a single easily to point, good batting and good running
fullish outside off and driven firmly to sweeper cover
poor ball and well dealt with, he reaches out to a full delivery and scoops it wide of third man, you can't give width like this and expect to get away with it
bowls it much shorter but drifts on the pads, Tharanga turns the face of the bat and nudges it down to fine leg, the fielder was too square to cut it off
driven firmly down the pitch and the ball deflects off his palm on the dive and rolls to the on side
tossed up on a length and he pushes the ball to extra cover
more of a straighter line and he knocks it to long-on
slower ball, floated up wide of off stump to get Sangakkara opening the face and steering it toward backward point
good line but not much turn and Tharanga reaches out and pushes the ball to cover
good ball, a bit fuller and dipping in and he pushes it back
ends the over with a tad wider delivery outside off which Tharanga steers out to deep backward point for a single
flat ball to begin with, no turn, pushed to cover
well tossed up and he defends
full and flat, some drift, no turn, pushed back to the bowler
pushes hard at the ball, rolls into the off side, Jadeja fields it
well bowled, slows it up, pitches on a length, Tharanag is sluggish on the drive and the ball pops back towards Jadeja but does not carry
flatter, middle and off, punched to the on side and Jadeja runs across
tosses it up outside off and Sangakkara eases a drive to cover
hangs back, waits for the turn and then dabs the ball toward backward point, sets off, sees Jadeja swoop in and turns back and makes it back as the fielder misses
tosses it up, gets some drift, punched toward the mid-on fielder
drifts into middle and leg, he looks to work it but gets a small leading edge to the off side

slower ball, middle and off, some turn, dabbed to the off side and Sangakkara sets off, Tharanga has to really pump it and just manages to make his ground as Jadeja nails an under-arm direct hit, that is alert fielding there but the batsmen get an extra due to the ricochet off the sticks
uses his feet to meet the ball and drive to extra cover
tossed up on the off stump, pushed to the off side nicely
straighter ball slides down and he slaps it past square for two
wider ball, steered out to the off side sweeper
tossed up and worked to the fielder again, cannot find the gaps
gets back and eases the ball to the off where Harbhajan stops it
very good over, tossed up on the stumps and he defends
nice and slow, on a good length, Sangakkara gets a small stride forward and pushes the ball to the off side
steered past point out to a moving Gambhir who cuts them to one
well bowled, more flight, hangs in the air longer, Tharanga comes forward and drives and finds the man at cover
and again he slows it up and gets him playing a hard-hit drive
tad shorter, Sangakkara hangs back and then pushes the ball to point
straighter, fuller ball on middle, on-driven to the fielder
good use of the crease, he moves back and steers a marginally short ball wide of Harbhajan at gully, good wristwork on that shot
tosses it up this time and Tharanga drives hard, and with too much bottom hand, and the ball rolls back past the bowler
fuller, slower, and he pats it back to Jadeja
slowly feeds him on the stumps and he bunts it to midwicket
too short, Tharanga back-cuts but picks out Harbhajan
slider down the pads, brushed away towards square leg
slow ball on off stump, drives hard towards extra cover
holds back the length, Sangakkara waits and punches to point
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed back, Harbhajan hurries across to his left side and does well to save a single
good ball, goes fuller and just outside off, with some drift, and Tharanga opens the face and drives to cover for one
brings his line to middle and off and Sangakkara defends
bit shorter, he waits for turn and then steers it to backward point
uses his crease and bunts the ball down to long-on
tosses it on a length and he gets back to push it back
pushed in flatter and quicker and he hits across the line to midwicket
sees a lot of room and cuts but cannot connect, Karthik fumbles
tossed up on middle and off, Sangakkara checks his shot and manages to get a single to long-on
pitches short and spins back in a long way to cramp Tharanga as he cuts, but he does well to get over the ball and chop it down in front of backward point
tossed up on middle and leg and he flicks it away to mid-on
good shot, just skips out a small ways and drills the ball back straight between mid-on and mid-off to move into the nineties
slows the pace, Tharanga still drives straight and this time Sehwag misfields and allows him a single
flighted up on a length and he pushes it to extra cover
uses his wrists to play against the turn and drive a single to long-on
dabs the ball to backward point and sets off, Jadeja collects and misses
tossed up outside off, he opens the face to steer it fine but misses
flatter ball on the stumps, worked away to the on side
slower one, pushes at it and turns it to the leg side
slower ball, well flighted outside off, Sangakkara sweeps and sweeps well into the gap behind square, but Kohli sprints across and palms the ball back with a great dive
a bit wider and shorter and he he back-cuts very, very well
slower, fuller ball, easily knocked down to long-on for one
spins away off a shorter length to Sangakkara, who gets back early and then has to check the shot as the ball stops on him, playing at it away from his body
uses his feet and wrists and on-drives an easy single
stands his ground and punches the ball to the off, Sehwag fields
well played, just turns a slower ball off middle and leg for a single
good ball, straighter and fuller, and Tharanga pats it back
drifts it in to middle and off and again Tharanga has to defend
full ball just outside off, Sangakkara drives and gets an inside edge to fine leg
that is a good shot, just leans into the ball and smacks it on the rise past cover
short down the pads, tucked off his hips for a single
pitched up on middle and off, some shape, pushed to extra cover
good ball, on a length, middle and off, he stabs at it and turns it to midwicket
full on off stump, searching for something on this flat track, Sangakkara turns the face and gets an easy single to the leg side
hangs on the back foot and crunches the ball out to deep cover
spins away from just outside off, no shot offered
tad short, he's cramped for room but cuts and gets an easy one
slower ball, middle and off, some drift,  pushed back to Sehwag
again too short and Sangakkara raise his half-century with a cut out to the deep point sweeper, he is making India pay for that reprieve on 0 ... oh boy
slows the pace, gets him onto the front foot, pushing to cover
tosses it up, pushed to the off side for one more, as Raina dives and cannot stop
spins down the pads from middle and leg, wide called
slowly feeds him on the pads, and he nudges one to midwicket
tossed up to bring out a drive, Tharanga checks the shot to cover

there it is, just bunts a fuller ball down past Raina and Sangakkara and raises his arms as he sets off, a very good innings after an early drop, his seventh century and first in three years, very pleasing effort it will be for a man trying to make his way back permanently
pitches it up on the pads and he knocks it away for one
gets two-thirds forward and turns the ball off his pads
flat down the pads and he angles the bat to get a single
slower ball, off stump, driven into the off side
slows it up and gets some turn, Tharanga pushes away from the bat and misses, Karthik collects and starts appealing, then Harbhajan joins in, but not out
flatter ball, gets over it and drives it past midwicket
drift, Sangakkara gets over it and steers the ball to cover-point
spins back in and stays low, Tharanga gets back and pushes to cover
tossed up on middle and off, he doesn't move his feet as he stabs at it
slower ball, more air, drifts in, again he drives hard and with not foot work and inside-edges to the leg side
drives loosely again, no timing or placement
slides into middle and leg and Tharanga knocks it past square leg
on the pads and driven nicely down to long-on for a single
plays with the turn and knocks it down the ground as well
well flighted on the stumps, getting him to drive, not well timed but he plays it back straight

tossed up again, gets it to hang in the air a fraction longer, out comes Sangakkara to hammer the ball straight along the ground past Harbhajan and Jadeja runs across on the ropes but does not dive, poor effort from the youngster

well stumped, and a loose shot from Sangakkara who hops right across his crease, exposing all the stumps, and misses a paddle sweep, the ball skims past him and Karthik collects, breaking the sticks with one hand as Sangakkara fractionally loses balance, well stumped because he had no time to do the needful
risky shot but he pulls it off, does Jayawardene, getting over the ball and dabbing very, very late down to third man
slower ball, outside leg, turns in, watchfully patted back
tossed up and Jayawardene drives it down the ground for one
slowly flighted on off stump, pushed off the front foot to cover
and again, watchfully pushed to fielder on the off side
now he pushes with a bit more intent and finds the gap at cover
flat on middle and leg, played across the line to midwicket
spins down the pads, played away to short fine where Zaheer fields
pushed through quicker, spins down the pads, Jayawardene plays a paddle and misses, Karthik collects, Jadeja appeals and I am not sure just what for
short and he pulls it out to Tendulkar at deep square leg
spins in from outside leg, he stands there and turns it away, Karthik reacts quickly and collects
spins away this time and Jayawardene steers it past backward point
good ball, speared in on the stumps and Tharanga jams it out
but now he bowls short and allows Tharanga to cut an easy two
rubbish, full and fast down the pads, wide ball, Karthik cannot stop it
short again and he cuts down into the ground but can't beat gully
tossed up on a length, pushed toward the off side
slows up the pace, lands it on middle and leg, driven to midwicket

fuller, flatter ball, middle and off, he goes for a paddle sweep and gets an inside edge, gets a faint tickle, skims off the pads, drops into the ground first, dribbles fine, Karthik takes very well and breaks the sticks, it is referred but not out
gets back and hits it well but to the fielder
goes back and gets a single this time
pushed in quicker, he looks to on-drive but loses balance
tossed up on a length, he goes for a shot but misses connecting
speared in full on middle and off, he uses his feet and flicks to midwicket
well played, Harbhajan spears it outside leg and Jayawardene sweeps it hard and over short fine leg for four
now he bowls it very wide outside off stump, without cover in the deep, and Jayawardene duly thumps that over the top for four more, beating cover with ease
now he plays a pick-up slap shot over midwicket, one bounce in front of the sweeper
outside off, tries to play it fine, gets an edge that rolls to the on side
makes room in his crease, going back to slap the ball between cover and point
starts moving away, Jadeja spots him and fires it in, and Tharanga has to play it back to him
there's a big hit, a good old fashioned slog over midwicket with the turn and the result is half a dozen for Tharanga
pushed into the blockhole as he backs away again, and Tharanga digs it out
another very full ball, he makes room and cannot time it well
well bowled, Jadeja, speared into leg stump and Tharanga just manages to squirt the ball into the off side
gone first ball! Zaheer doesn't allow much room, just bowls it full and straight, Tharanga chases it with a big swing and no footwork and inside-edges it back onto his stumps
pitches on a good length and slants in, Perera swings first ball and it ball skims his thigh pad through to Karthik
fuller ball into the stumps, he plays an aerial shot over the off side and gets off the mark in international cricket, in the deep Harbhajan runs around and shows off his footwork on the boundary
well bowled, there is no fine leg in place and still he drops in a bouncer, not sure why, and so Perera hooks and gets his first four
goes full and serves up a low full toss, had he hit Perera was a goner, but he plays a wild slog and top edges safely
short of a length just outside off, Jayawardene plays a cheeky little attempt to uppercut but misses, Karthik takes and appeals
plays another shot over the top, just doesn't move his feet much but drives high and holds the shot, getting it over mid-off and it drops just inside the boundary
bowls it full on leg stump, he clips and gets an inside edge to midwicket
well bowled, flat on middle and leg, watchfully turned out to square leg

good ball, flighted up on full on leg stump, Perera makes room and inside-edges the booming drive, the ball runs out to the deep where Nehra runs after it, slides, cannot stop it, and then falls over the rope as he continues to try and flail away, basically he's lying on top of the ropes and trying to keep the ball from making contact
in the blockhole, defends, gets an inside edge to short third man
makes room and drives over the top for four, lovely hit from Jayawardene
full ball just outside off, Perera backs away and swings and misses
smacked! Zaheer pitches on a length and Perera dismisses the ball with a spanking pull, he just gets back in a flash and goes over midwicket
aims for a yorker outside off, Perera still backs away and scoops the ball out to the deep where Harbhajan does very, very well on the ropes to save a single, really good running and diving
goes full, Jayawardene bunts to mid-off and sets off, Kohli runs across
oh what a shot! Zaheer again aims for the yorker, doesn't pull it off, and Perera gets under it and scoops it over mid-on for four more, tremendous shot there
goes for the blockhole once more but Perera continues to make room and swing, and this time manages an inside edge to short fine leg

taken in the deep! Perera's fun little knock ends as he again tries to get under a full ball and slog it away, but he ends up with a top edge that goes very high and settles in Jadeja's hands, running in from wide long-on
short of a length outside leg stump, he gets up and tucks it off his hips
pitches on a length, Kandamby plays a half-hearted poke and misses

fuller ball on middle and leg, twirled in the air between mid-on and midwicket, Jadeja fields in the deep and returns a wide throw towards Karthik's end but he is not near the stumps and an extra run is given
shorter ball, cant connect, so India get a dot ball
on the stumps and cracked away past the infield, Raina dives but cannot save the boundary on the leg side
full outside off, Jayawardene makes room and slices it over the off side, Tendulkar runs in and dives but the ball starts to curve away from him and he cannot get there
in the blockhole, defended off the back foot, steals a single
into the pads, flicked in style to midwicket, Raina collects and fires a throw, Zaheer was not behind the stumps entirely and fumbles the collection

good bowling, full and straight, Jayawardene clears his toes and bunts the yorker to mid-on and sets off, Harbhajan knocks down the stumps and they all appeal but umpire Hazare does not want the third umpire and replays show he is spot on
again full and fast, a bit too fine, and Kandamby twirls the ball to fine leg
very good bowling, again full in the zone and Jayawardene can only work the ball out to deep square leg for one
short and rising, Jayawardene flashes at it but cant connect

Nehra! First he bowls a good ball, a nice yorker ala Zaheer, Jayawardene falls over it and clips an inside edge onto his left boot, the ball rolls to the off side but he wants the single, Nehra runs across to collect the ball, falls over, but nails down the stumps with a direct hit, there really was no single there, and well fielded Nehra
not a good follow-up ball, a full toss on the pads, flicked away fine
pitches it up, Kandamby drives it back, Nehra stops it in his followthrough with his right leg
full ball, no room on offer, so Kandamby gets across and tries to paddle it very fine but misses, and somehow the ball misses hitting the stumps
swings away at a length ball down leg stump, getting more of an inside edge that the fine leg fielder collects
full on the stumps and Kandamby gets the wrists into play, clipping between two fielders for four
bangs in a bouncer, Kandamby loses sight as he hooks but the ball drops in no man's land
cramps him for room with a length ball, Samaraweera stands there and dabs an open-faced bat to get the ball behind backward point
pitched up on the pads, twirled out to the deep to raise 300
aims for a yorker but its a wide outside off, Kandamby starts to back away and then has to reach out to get the toe end of the bat on the ball, then denies the single
rubbish ball, a full toss outside off and Kandamby duly cracks it past a diving extra cover fielder for four
hops back to outside leg stump and dabs the short ball down to third man for two, Harbhajan runs across from the deep and doesn't pick up cleanly
another full ball, nearly a yorker, outside off and Samaraweera opens the face and steers it fine, Kohli dives at backward point and releases fast, very well done
full outside off and he steers the ball to the off side for one
makes a little bit of room to the leg side and drives the ball over extra cover, a very well hit shot at the end
full on the stumps, he backs away and pushes it past Nehra
moves outside leg stump and drives the ball to deep midwicket

inn2.comm: and his first ball in ODIs is pitched up wide and Sehwag just checks his shot, and places the ball between cover and point for four
slides down the pads, Sehwag cannot connect, ball rolls off his pads
goes back in his crease and slashes a short delivery in the air but safely wide of backward point and third man does the mopping up
slides down the pads, there's a bit of deviation, no contact with the bat though and Sangakkara leaps to his left to try and save the ball from running away but cannot collect it cleanly
back of a length and he defends it back watchfully
lovely shot, just rolls the wrists against the swing and clips the ball past midwicket
just a lazy push without much footwork and he gets a single past extra cover
short of a length outside off, good bounce, he gets up and works down
on a length and he works the ball to midwicket
bouncer over Sehwag, who ducks as a wide is called

no footwork from Sehwag as he flashes a cramped cut an a short ball angling back in, not close enough to cut and the sharp movement slices him in half, Sangakkara collects and goes up to ask the question
gone! Lakmal persists with that shortish length and gets some more good bounce and Sehwag just hops back and pushes a streaky shot to Dilshan at backward point
welcomed first ball with a short one and he flinches as it sails over, a no ball is signalled because it is the second bouncer of the over
fuller ball and Gambhir pushes it watchfully to cover
full again, but just outside leg stump so there's only half an appeal when Gambhir mistimes the attempted flick off the pads
just a nudge off the pads as Perera serves up a half-volley
again he veers down the leg side but this time Tendulkar is late on the shot and the ball trickles off his pads to short fine leg
pitches it up in search of swing, Tendulkar eases an on-drive straight to the fielder
again on the pads and now Tendulkar brushes it toward short square leg
eases into a drive off the front foot and picks out short cover
gets over a short one and cracks it straight to Dilshan at point
short of a length and he gets in line nicely to block
good movement and bounce beats him as he feels for it off the back foot, very well bowled
ah, good one, just picks the short ball down the body and gets across to put it away over square leg

slapped to cover-point where Randiv takes it! Not really a wicket-taking delivery but Lakmal won't mind because he's taken out the two openers! Tendulkar rocks back to cut it away but cannot keep the ball down and Randiv slides to his left to pouch the catch
bangs in a bouncer that is called wide for height and beats Sangakkara
shoulders arms on one back of a length outside off stump
goes full to end the over and Kohli watchfully plays to cover
flashes outside off and misses out
just a push down the ground and plays it very, very nicely too
short and he plays it nicely it down to backward point
down the pads, brushes them and he gets four leg byes to fine leg
cracked off the back foot by Gambhir and Dilshan flings himself to his left to save runs, what a fielder, what a guy
pitches it up and Kohli defends
short of a length and he steers it forcefully to point again
now he pulls off the cut shot well, nicely getting tall on the tiptoes and crunching the ball into the gap between cover and point
slides in off a short length and he counter the movement with a nudge
good shot, just clips against the full, swinging ball and picks the gap
flirts at one sitting up outside off stump and nearly edges it, Lakmal is getting good bounce when he bangs it in, good to see for the youngster
fuller and he pushes it to the cover fielder
well played, gets on top of the bounce and steers it to third man
slapped! Perera drops short but is not as effective as Lakmal, and Kohli rocks back and across and plays a superb pull shot over midwicket
slower ball, much fuller on middle and off, and Kohli defends
slides down the pads, Sangakkara collects
gets over a length ball and sees it off watchfully
stands there and uses the pace and width to steer a single to third man
pitches it up to Gambhir who runs it off the front foot to point
back of a length well outside off and he shoulders arms
fuller ball slants back in and Kohli clips it to midwicket
ah! Full outside off, some shape away and that sneaks past the bat as Kohli flashes a drive away from the body
good ball, fourth dot in a row, hits a length and forces him to block
short of a length on off stump, he gets up and pushes it to mid-on

no footwork as he throws the bat at one pitched up full and wide, gets a thick outer edge down to third man, looks like four but then Perera flings himself into the frame and stops a boundary, well done there man
goes for a good length and gets shape, Kohli drops his head and defends
gets tall and defends the ball back again, thats good bowling
good shot! Nothing more than a flick of the wrists, ala Laxman, and the ball speeds away past midwicket, he clipped that from middle and off nearly
again a punchy shot, just slashes the ball between cover and point
slower ball goes awry, down the pads and he gets a faint tickle
four in four! Terror over from Malinga, who now offers room outside off and Kohli stands there and flashes it down to third man
slower ball on leg stump, some swing, watchfully tapped away
the shot he makes a living playing, on the pads and a twirl of the wrists sends the ball flying across the grass for four
gets over a length delivery and dabs it to backward point
good short ball, hits the deck and sits up into Gambhir, who takes his eyes off it and ends up copping it on the left glove, good use of the short ball again from Lakmal
back of a length and he gets back and pushes the ball to cover
fuller ball, middle and leg, driven back to the bowler
back of a length on top of off stump and Kohli opens the face to manufacture a single to backward point
short of a length and angling away, draws the outer edge as Gambhir plays and nicks it, nearly done in by the bounce, and the result is four to third man
served up outside leg stump and he works a single to square leg
gets some good bounce outside off stump, no shot offered, wide called
pushed positively off the front foot but straight to backward point
short of a length, he gets back and punches to extra cover
fuller ball on middle stump, he walks across and plays a neat little flick out to the sweeper to keep strike
full outside off, wobbles before carrying on the second bounce to Sangakkara
good punchy shot to a length ball outside off, not much footwork but Kohli finds the window and gets the sweeper into play
hangs back to the slower shorter ball and opens the face, guiding it off the bat to get one down to third man
short and wide, he chases it with too much bottom hand and chops it into the ground
gets back and works the ball to the fielder on the off side this time
gets more width outside off and chases at it with no foot movement, again chopping it down in front of point, and loudly admonishes himself
goes for a back foot shot and the ball stays low
on the pads, turns it to short fine leg for a single
again Kohli goes hard and with no footwork at one pitching short of a length, and now he gets an inside edge back past leg stump
slides onto the pads and he works it down to fine leg for one
back of a length but too straight, worked off his legs to square leg
plants his back leg across to cover off stump and then runs a shortish ball off the bat, playing with soft hands, and smartly gets a single behind backward point
comes dancing out and drives hard, Jayasuriya dives and takes pace off the ball at cover, well done champ
pitches it up and he punches it back with a straight bat
nice little dab, soft hands and all, into the ground in front of gully
short of a length, pushed nicely to extra cover off the back foot
early into his shot to one pitching fuller outside off, but he rolls the wrists and places the ball to the right of the midwicket fielder
beats the outer edge on the last ball, to deny them a single
pitches on a length and he gets over it, dabbing the ball to point
a touch shot, just allows the ball come onto his pads and then gets those wrists into play, turning the ball as he hops back and getting it onto the wide space
better ball, a good length outside off and he shoulders arms
back of a length, good bounce, but he gets over it and dabs with soft hands into the ground in front of point and looks up at Kohli before running
slower ball just outside leg stump, very close, Kohli walks across but doesn't pick the slow full toss and misses out
back of a length on the pads, turned to deep backward square leg
tosses it up, Kohli moves about and brushes the ball off his pads
slower ball, flighted up on off stump, Gambhir gets over it and nudges it square for a single that gets 100 on the board for India
slowly floated down the pads, well clipped out to the deep for two
flatter ball on a length and he gets back in line to nicely punch to mid-on
gets over the ball and pushes it to the off side
slides down and Kohli knocks it away for one
gets over the top of the ball and runs it down to third man for one
gets a lot of room and cracks the ball fiercely past the off-side cordon
fuller ball on off stump, slower too, he's early into his drive and gets an inside edge to the leg side
short ball, Kohli gets down and leaves it be as it passes
good flick of the wrists to one pitched up and swinging into the pads
another good shot, walks across and brushes the ball off his hips
tossed up from around the stumps, pushed to the off side
played to the leg side for one
outside off, tapped away and sets off
gets across the ball and works it past the leg side for two, running hard
tossed up on the pads, turned away smartly again
unlucky, due to the dew the slower ball slips out as a rank full toss down the pads and Kohli swing and inside-edged down to fine leg for four
flat on middle and leg, Gambhir gets over it and works to midwicket
gets over a marginally wider ball and steers it past backward point to raise his second half-century of the series and fourth over all, well played young man
down the pads and he brushes it away for one
slowly tossed up; he drives off the front foot to long-off
flatter and quicker ball on the pads, flicked out to the deep
slower one drifts down the pads, he goes for a flick and gets a small leading edge
gets over the ball and pulls off the flick this time
brings up his half-century as well, getting marginally back and steering the ball wide of backward point, then raises his bat to the crowd and his team-mates
tossed up and defended
gets over the bounce and pushes the ball down for a hard-run two
tossed up, he skips out and clips the ball between midwicket and mid-on
too straight and he knocks it past square leg for a single
tossed up and he skips out to drive inside-out  past cover
slower ball, on a length outside off, gets Kohli reaching out and playing across the line with the turn and he gets a single past midwicket
gets back and steers the ball to backward point
attempts the shot again and this time plays it into the gap, going back and opening the face and placing it past the diving short third man
flighted on off stump, Kohli uses the wrists and gets one past midwicket
shorter ball, spins in, he gets back and across and bunts it away
plays it while coming forward this time, turning it wide of short fine leg
slower, flighted delivery on middle and off, he drives early and gets an inside edge
a wee bit too straight and he glances to short fine leg
similar line and he stands there and brushes it past square leg
well bowled, slows it up and gets Kohli to reach and out play against the turn, he ends up scooping it back in the air down the ground
comes forward and defends
arm ball, down the pads, worked straight to short fine leg
forces Gambhir on the back foot and he plays a cramped cut shot
another cut and this time he misses as the ball gets big on him
good ball again,gets some drift and Gambhir punches to cover
tossed up on middle and off and Kohli drives it back past the stumps

quicker ball, he gets back and guides it to third man, the throw comes back on the bounce, beats Sangakkara and hits the stumps at  the other end, Jayasuriya does not back up and they get more runs, well that was needless
gets back and forces the ball out to the sweeper again
flatter ball, no turn, he stands in position and on-drives a single
gets back and bunts the ball wide of midwicket for one more
drives hard at one on a teasing length and Jayasuriya collects
angled down the pads, gets a tickle and a single to short fine
on the pads, and punched away to deep square leg for a single
looks to open the face and run it past short third, but hits straight to Jaya, yet comes through for an easy single
on the pads, but can't get it past midwicket
looks to work it around the corner, but the ball doesn't turn, and he is beaten
this time he gets the one on the pads, and gets an easy single to deep square leg
and he gets a four, this is not nearly short enough to pull, but he rocks back and hits it hard and wide of midwicket. They are easing the pressure off before it can build
and now he plays it down the ground for a jogged single
flat and straight, gets onto the front foot, works it into the on side, and scampers through for a couple. Good early call
flat delivery, on the stumps, played straight to midwicket this time
gets too straight this time, and is worked away for a single
pitched up, driven to wide of long-on, but will be just a single
Randiv dives to his right and saves a single here
again he dives to his right, but makes only a half stop this time. This is the 150th run of the partnership
steps down the track, and works it into the on side for one
short, angled across him, punched down the ground
too full, on the pads, bunted into the on side with soft hands, and they rush through for a couple. Again clear calling
floated outside off, this time he leaves it alone
drops short outside off stump and he swats it down to Randiv at deep square leg
overpitched this time and he chases and edges to third man
tip and run from Gambhir, just waits in his crease and angles the bat near his feet, looks up, Kohli responds and they squeak a run
shot, man! Stands there and uses the room to crack a perfect slash between the covers and gets to his highest ODI score
gets over a fuller ball and punches it down to long-on
hits a length and brings him forward, playing it back while losing balance
hits a length, he opens the face and runs the ball to third man
good shot again, just collects the length ball from off stump and whips it out to deep square leg for a single
much fuller in search of swing, pitches on middle stump and Kohli again clips it nicely out to the sweeper
short ball, sits up and he gets over it and keeps it down

well stopped, Dilshan! Gambhir gets tall and forces the ball off the middle but Dilshan flings himself around at backward point and saves runs, but when he releases and misses the stumps there is no backing up
bouncer to end the over, Kohli weaves under it
stands up and forces the ball down in front of gully
pitches it up now and Gambhir drives a single to long-off
beaten on the forward press as the ball stays low and doesn't carry to Sangakkara
full again and he's early into his drive and inside-edges
ah! This time he gets Gambhir to go fishing but he manages to edge it down in front of a diving slip fielder
overpitched on the pads and he flicks out to Kandamby at sweeper
wide down the pads, no contact and Sangakkara collects
slower ball, full on middle and off, checks his shot to cover, more of a small leading edge because he was looking to whip it away
stands there and throws the bat at width and slashes to deep point
chases a wide ball as well and just beats short cover for one
slower ball on a length just outside off, he dabs it in front of point, sets off and they make it very closely
chases the ball again and misses as it tails back in but its too wide
pushes on the rise and places it to the right of cover
slower ball, low full toss on the pads, turned past midwicket
on middle and leg and worked out to the deep
fuller in length and he drives hard down to mid-off
leans into another full ball and this beats the man at cover
full down the pads, he flicks and misses

chases a bat at a length ball outside off and misses, Sangakkara collects and jumps for joy as he thinks Kohli edged it but umpire Hazare stands unmoved and that is a good call because replays show he missed the ball indeed
on the pads and on-driven for a couple down to long-on
gets back and keeps strike with a single
dropped by Sangakkara! Short and a bit wide, Kohli cuts and feathers an edge but it goes down, even the second and third attempts are not taken, that was a big nick
uses his feet and drives a single down the ground
slides into Gambhir who knocks it to deep midwicket for one
quicker ball, he stays back and slashes down to third man
no turn, he gets back and makes room to steer wide of point
tossed up and he checks the drive back to Dilshan
pulls a short ball down to deep backward square leg where Samaraweera fumbles
again short, this time outside off, and Kohli slams it over midwicket
quicker ball, goes back and punches the ball to cover
slower ball, a bit fuller, uses the wrists and on-drives a single
pitches outside leg, Gambhir turns it to midwicket
down the pads, no turn, and worked away to the sweeper
tossed up on a length and he punches it between cover and point
slower ball, fuller in length and he defends it back
stands tall and punches it and gets an inside edge
goes back to one that curls in and then bisects two men square on the off side, lovely placement from Gambhir on that occasion, plays spin so well
slower ball brings him onto the front foot driving into the covers
comes forward and works the ball off his stumps to midwicket
comes forward and defends just wide of the bowler
flatter ball dipping on middle and off, clipped past midwicket
comes forward to the pitch and again clips the ball wide of midwicket
flat on the stumps, he drives back and curses out loud
a bit finer and he uses the angle to glance off his pads
skips out and takes on the volley, driving in the air past mid-on
too short and Gambhir punches off the back foot to deep cover
pushes him on the back foot and he plays it back to Dilshan
moves to 99 with another pleasing on-drive wide of midwicket
pushed in flatter and he works it off his pads, also moving to 99

special moment for the younster and he punches the air in delight! A shot he has played fluently all evening raises Kohli's maiden ODI century, just works the ball with the turn and gets a single wide of midwicket, a very good innings from him indeed

and that's two centuries in two balls, as Gambhir gets back to a slightly short delivery and steers it to backward point, his seventh ODI century and one he will be very proud of if India win this series here
on the pads and played to the fielder
again on the pads and this time he flicks wide of midwicket
flays the bat at a full ball and cannot connect at all
chips it off his pads in the air behind square, falls safely in the deep
onto the front foot, driving down to long-off for a single
down the leg side, he goes for a big shot, goes high in the air and cleanly bisects two sweepers in the deep and gets six near deep backward square leg
fullish outside off, Gambhir milks a single into the covers

skips out and looks to dump this over long-on but ends up miscuing it, its up there for a while and the sub, Pushpakumara, settles under it and cups it just in front of the boundary, ending a very pleasing century from Kohli
slides down the pads and he gets a faint tickle on the ball
speared into middle and off and he drives the ball into the covers
gets his head over the ball and defends to point, Gambhir is alert for the single and sprints down very well
spins in, he goes back to turn it away but instead gets a leading edge in front of backward point, Karthik this time is the one who initiates the quick single
skips out and takes on the short ball, swinging it superbly between midwicket and mid-on and the sweeper hasn't a chance to stop that
fuller ball, he reaches out and drives on the rise to cover
well played, gets up and uppercuts the rising ball over gully
change of pace and length draws a checked shot from Gambhir
fuller in length, he has a hard go at it and edges down into the covers
good length on that one and it skims past the bat as he feels for it
tossed up just outside off and Gambhir guides it to backward point where Tharanga over-runs the ball
slower ball, defended uneasily back down to Randiv, it sort of pops back but does not carry
uses his feet and clips it wide of midwicket for a single
makes room, skips out and slices the ball over cover-point
tossed up on a length and Karthik drives nicely past the covers
gets some drift from around the stumps but Gambhir counters that with a flowing push on the rise past the man at cover
dragged in too short and in a flash Gambhir takes it on, pulling nicely
slower ball overpitched on the toes and he flicks to the sweeper
back of a length just outside off, Karthik stands there and opens the face to run the ball toward backward point
hah, take that! Low full toss and sweetly pushed back past the bowler and stumps
shorter ball gets him flirting but there's no bat on ball
slower ball just on leg stump and cutting in, he waits and dabs to cover, well played Gambhir
spins away, he goes after it and dabs it wide of backward point
very, very wide outside off stump
slower ball drifts in and pushes it gently into the off side
rides the bounce of a shorter one and chops it down past point
gets back and across and looks to glance but can't time it well
slides down, he works it away, on the bounce it goes toward Sangkarra who doesn't realize as Karthik sets off and that could have been a close stumping
slower one, some turn, pushed away for an easy single
oversteps and Gambhir angles the no-ball to backward point, and we have a free hit coming up ...
slow ball on the pads, worked in the air out to deep square leg
steers a shortish ball to Dilshan at backward point, who falls to his left and tries to take it one-handed but the ball dies on him and runs away for a couple
short of a length, gets tall and runs it down to third man
slower ball just angling past off stump and Gambhir is beaten after trying that cheeky little open-faced steer to third man
short ball down the leg side and that means poor Sangakkara has to fling himself around and save runs, well taken behind the stumps, skip
well played, with fine leg up Malinga cannot afford to bowl on the pads and Gambhir plays a very handy glance for four
overpitched outside off stump, Gambhir opens the face and steers the ball behind point for a single that makes him the highest individual scorer in an ODI in Kolkata
too much room outside off allows him to push the ball to deep cover
slow ball, a low full toss, which Karthik drives to mid-on
slow bouncer down the leg side, Karthik flinches as it passes
bouncer down the leg side, Karthik shoulders arms as it skims past his armpit and then looks at the umpire but there is no reaction
but now umpire Erasmus reacts as the third bouncer is hurled down
predictably, the full ball and he clips it off his pads for a single
short of a length and steered with a full face of the bat down to the sweeper near the ropes and Gambhir keeps ticking along like the Energizer bunny
chases a full ball outside off to point where a misfield allows two
chases width again and this time bisects cover and point
slower ball, off stump, he gets over it and dabs into the covers
drives on the up and picks out that gap between cover and point
another easy single picked off the erratic Malinga
wide full toss outside off, toe-ended wide of backward point
pokes at one on a length outside off and gets an inside edge past leg stump
another slow bouncer down the stumps and he ducks under it
straighter ball on middle and off, punched down to mid-on
another short ball, to which Gambhir arches his back and uppercuts it down on the bounce to third man
on the full, driven on the rise to extra cover where Malinga tries to stop the ball with his feet but makes a total mess of it
another bouncer down the stumps, getting him to crouch low

there it is, India win the series and Gambhir gets to 150! Malinga serves it up full outside off stump and Gambhir carves it excellent  between two fielders and pumps his arms, a great knock from him and his team-mates and the crowd celebrate raucously
